content.description: In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, the function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is graphed on the interval <math alttext="0 less or equal than x less or equal than 10"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>10</mn></math>. The point <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> is on the graph of <math alttext="y equals h open parentheses x close parentheses"> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> </math>.
content.question: Which of the following points is on the graph of <math alttext="y equals 2 h open parentheses x close parentheses minus 1"> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> <mo>-</mo> <mn>1</mn> </math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
